locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ Torch Puzzle Room Che:
can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Dins_Fire) or 
                (is_adult and (logic_dc_jump or Hover_Boots or Progressive_Hookshot))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lower Right Side:
here(can_blast_or_smash or
                      ((can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and
                       (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love))))
exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Area:
is_adult or (here(is_adult) and has_explosives) or
                (logic_dc_mq_child_bombs and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and
                    (damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

(here(is_adult and can_use(Bow)) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or
                 can_use(Dins_Fire) or has_explosives) and
                (can_use(Slingshot))

locations.GS Dodongo's Cavern MQ Scrub Room:
(here(is_adult and can_use(Bow)) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or
                 can_use(Dins_Fire) or has_explosives) and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang))

locations.King Dodongo Heart:
(Bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
locations.King Dodongo:
(Bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
